title: 34. Q&A | We Have Different Opinions! At Home Microneedling, Esthetician School, Drug Store Products, and More
description:
Hi esties and friends - today we are going back to basics and answering your DM questions. We get into esthetician school, enzymes vs. AHA/BHAs, at home microneedling (and why we don't recommend it), drug store products, and more. Please let us know what other questions you have, our inboxes are always open! As always, we would appreciate a review on iTunes if you feel so inclined. Xoxo, Tess & Lo

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
